snippet.title: Into the Fire - Gameplay Trailer | The Triple-i Initiative
snippet.description:
Learn more about Into the Fire: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2988030/Into_the_Fire/

Today, we are revealing the first gameplay video of Into the Fire, a disaster extraction survival with arcade elements that will explode in Steam Early Access later this year. Into the Fire will have you braving fury of nature as you face volcanic demons on Dante's Archipelago. Armed with fantastic retro inventions and firefighting weapons, you will need to combat a deadly disaster and extract as many lives as possible in a time-pressing run for survival. Discover fiery myths, unexplained phenomena and mystery relics lurking within the inferno. Challenge the world of fire and ash—upgrade your gear, expand your base and take part in dark rituals as you fight against the volcano's wrath. Once its breath reaches you, every second counts.

Follow news and updates on The Triple-i Initiative:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/sale/triple-i-initiative 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/iii_initiative 
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@iii_initiative 
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/iii_initiative 
Bilibili: https://space.bilibili.com/3546638813497663
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/iii_initiative 
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@the.iii_initiative 

What is the triple-i initiative?

The Triple-i Initiative is a bunch of studios banding together to share exciting news to our players, in a short show packed with back-to-back trailers. That’s it - no extra fluff, no ads, no host, just games. We’re talking world premieres, exclusive gameplay, launch dates, demo drops and more!

You can learn more over on https://iii-initiative.com
